org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.agent.moving

Class MovingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.agent.core.Agent<MoverAction>
      • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.agent.moving.MovingAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoAgent

    public class MovingAgent
extends Agent<MoverAction>
    Simple Agent implementation that represents agent moving in the simulation. Such an agent will perform MoverActions thanks to a MovingAgentBody and a MovingBehavior.

      • MovingAgent

        public MovingAgent(java.lang.String id,
                   MovingAgentBody body,
                   MovingBehavior behavior)
        MovingAgent constructor. Sets the Plan of the specified MovingAgentBody, and updates it with the origin and destination specified in the MovingBehavior.
        Parameters:
        id - Agent id
        body - Agent body
        behavior - Moving behavior
